Crashing when trading with merchant was a prepatched problem.  I have had zero problems so far running with patch V1.1  So far for me there is no reason to patch again.  

There's another torrent here (and available as a direct download from a number of sites online) that patches to 1.1 only.

All in all - it works for me - just trying to save ya'll the $15.


PS.  Sarkterris - Wouldn't complain bout not having the crack just yet in the US - Game doesn't hit the shelves til tomorrow.  Some crackers actually like to use the real game to work with.
